alert.note: Alert for Oregon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 04 at 10:18PM CDT until November 04 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Oregon County in south central Missouri... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1017 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near West Plains to 6 miles northeast of Sturkie to Oxford, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Grand Gulf State Park, Thayer, Alton, Koshkonong, Thomasville, Rover, Myrtle, Wilderness, Couch and Greer. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
